content.title: Two days Ride from Bangalore to Mysore [2 Days + 1 Night]
content.author: Karthik
content.content:
Route

Bangalore -> Chamundeshwari Temple -> Mysuru Sand Sculpture Museum -> Karanji Lake -> Mysore Palace -> KRS Dam -> Yedmuri Falls -> Ranganathittu Bird Sanctuary -> Sri Ranganathaswamy Temple (Pancharanga Kshetram) -> Janapada Loka -> Bangalore

Map - [ https://bit.ly/2XvKnW3 ]
